CFBD Games Endpoint

cfbd_games.Rd

CFBD Games Endpoint

Get results information from games

Calendar - Returns calendar of weeks by season

Get Game media information (TV, radio, etc)

Get game advanced box score information

Get results information from games

Get Team records by year

Get Team Statistics by Game

cfbd_game_info(
  year,
  week = NULL,
  season_type = "regular",
  team = NULL,
  home_team = NULL,
  away_team = NULL,
  conference = NULL,
  game_id = NULL,
  quarter_scores = FALSE
)

cfbd_calendar(year)

cfbd_game_media(
  year,
  week = NULL,
  season_type = "both",
  team = NULL,
  conference = NULL,
  media_type = NULL
)

cfbd_game_box_advanced(game_id, long = FALSE)

cfbd_game_player_stats(
  year,
  week = NULL,
  season_type = "regular",
  team = NULL,
  conference = NULL,
  category = NULL,
  game_id = NULL
)

cfbd_game_records(year, team = NULL, conference = NULL)

cfbd_game_team_stats(
  year,
  week = NULL,
  season_type = "regular",
  team = NULL,
  conference = NULL,
  game_id = NULL,
  rows_per_team = 1
)

Arguments

year

(Integer required): Year, 4 digit format (YYYY)
week

(Integer optional): Week - values range from 1-15, 1-14 for seasons pre-playoff, i.e. 2013 or earlier
season_type

(String default: regular): Select Season Type - regular, postseason, or both
team

(String optional): D-I Team
home_team

(String optional): Home D-I Team
away_team

(String optional): Away D-I Team
conference

(String optional): Conference abbreviation - Select a valid FBS conference
Conference abbreviations P5: ACC, B12, B1G, SEC, PAC
Conference abbreviations G5 and FBS Independents: CUSA, MAC, MWC, Ind, SBC, AAC
game_id

(Integer optional): Game ID filter for querying a single game
Can be found using the cfbfastR::cfbd_game_info() function
quarter_scores

(Logical default FALSE): This is a parameter to return the list columns that give the score at each quarter: home_line_scores and away_line_scores.
I have defaulted the parameter to false so that you will not have to go to the trouble of dropping it.
media_type

(String optional): Media type filter: tv, radio, web, ppv, or mobile
long

(Logical default FALSE): Return the data in a long format.
category

(String optional): Category filter (e.g defensive)
Offense: passing, receiving, rushing
Defense: defensive, fumbles, interceptions
Special Teams: punting, puntReturns, kicking, kickReturns
rows_per_team

(Integer default 1): Both Teams for each game on one or two row(s), Options: 1 or 2

Source

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/games

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/calendar

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/games/media

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/game/box/advanced

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/games/players

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/records

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/games/teams

if (FALSE) {
  cfbd_game_player_stats(2018, week = 15, conference = 'Ind')

  cfbd_game_player_stats(2013, week=1, team = "Florida State", category = 'passing')
}
if (FALSE) {
  cfbd_game_records(2018, team = 'Notre Dame')

  cfbd_game_records(2013, team = "Florida State")
}
if (FALSE) {
  cfbd_game_team_stats(2019, team = 'LSU')

  cfbd_game_team_stats(2013, team = "Florida State")
}
